meanings.sent1: The jargonists in the meeting confused everyone with their technical language.
meanings.sent2: The group of jargonists discussed complex terms that were hard to understand.
meanings.sent3: The jargonists at the conference had everyone scratching their heads with their fancy words.
meanings.sent4: The jargonists were like wizards casting spells with their specialized vocabulary.
meanings.sent5: The jargonists were like walking dictionaries, always ready to explain any term.

meanings.sent1: We invited the jargonists to share their expertise on technical terms.
meanings.sent2: The jargonists gathered to exchange their knowledge of industry-specific language.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with jargonists, each one a master of their own linguistic realm.
meanings.sent4: The jargonists stood out in the crowd, their vocabulary shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: Among the jargonists, there was a sense of camaraderie in their shared lexicon.
